subject: Hockey, Ice
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Pain-Relieving Drugs
lead_paragraph: Jordan Hart, 31, of New York, was charged on Tuesday in a conspiracy to sell prescription painkillers to Derek Boogaard, the former Rangers player who died of an overdose in 2011.
snippet: Jordan Hart, 31, of New York, was charged on Tuesday in a conspiracy to sell prescription painkillers to Derek Boogaard, the former Rangers player who died of an overdose in 2011.
